full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSUNG 'BUM LAS KHYUNG GI SGRUB THABS GDON 'JOMS SPU GRI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI BKA' CHEN LHA BTZUN BLO BZANG SNYING PO DANG, AER TE NI NANG SO CAN GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL LHA'I BTZUN PA ^BLO BZANG MING 'CHANG BAS SUG BRIS SU BKOD PA'O,, ,,)
